ingredients.content: ¼ - ½ tsp ground cayenne pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place oil and onion in mixing bowl then chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula then sauté <b>3 min/100°C/speed <b>.
Avoiding blades, add ginger, coriander, cinnamon and cayenne then fry  <b>2 min/100°C//speed <b>.

Add courgette, carrot, tomato, apricots (if using) and 100 g stock then simmer <b>10 min/98°C//speed <b> until vegetables are tender. Meanwhile, prepare couscous acccording to packet instructions using remaining stock.
Season to taste then serve tagine with couscous.
